templates.name: raf-homepage
templates.description: RAF Recruitment homepage with hero video, apprenticeships video embed, dual-panel CTA sections, diversity text section, and contact banner

blocks.name: embed-featured
blocks.notes: Parser also extracts h2 heading, h3 subtitle, description text, and CTA link from within .videosingle and adjacent .apprenticeships-cta-container. Section style 'apprenticeships' applies italic rotated h2, full-width embed, and custom h3/button styling.

blocks.name: section-diversity
blocks.notes: Section style 'diversity' applies italic rotated headings and renders the CTA link as a 67px circle arrow icon via CSS background-image.

blocks.name: section-contact
blocks.notes: Dark section with centered heading, subtitle, and two CTA buttons (Live Chat + Contact Us) displayed side-by-side.
